__e: Just because she's a thief and a hitter... doesn't mean she isn't a good woman in all the other departments.
Take this little thief and don't let her out of your sight till I return. - Did you catch her?
You once gave up everything to be with me, to be a bandit in the woods, and you said something to me once that I should've taken to heart.
I mean, you're not like nurse by day, cat burglar by night?
I knew you were a boyfriend stealer from the moment I met you.
Because there's no reason an identity thief will be carrying around hundreds of thousands of dollars in cash.
